title: Rogue Lightning
description: Action. Danger. Romance. Intrigue.Annie and her companions return to space in this adventure. After some fun on the beach, and a grand spirit ceremony, our intrepid heroes head off-planet hoping to recover the lost ranch earnings. Along the way, there are pirates, prisoners and prostitutes to deal with. Battles, and love are both won and lost. Sir Jacob is still working his way out of the closet. Annieâ€™s mother puts in her two cents worth. And Wolf is as handsome as ever. Be prepared to laugh, love and cry along the way.Although this is a light heartened work of fiction designed primarily to entertain the reader, the twin themes of dedication to family and pride in heritage run strong throughout its pages.
author: Barbara Neville
